definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to skip stones (on water)/(coll.) to squander one's money on a bad investment
using a wicker basket to draw water (idiom); wasted effort
using a wicker basket to draw water (idiom); wasted effort
pinyin: zhu2 lan2 da3 shui3 , yi1 chang2 kong1

sentences.english: The girl was bucketing water from the well.
sentences.chinese: 那姑娘在用桶从井里打水。

sentences.english: Making matters even more difficult, he says the trucks must drive to a well in order to get water.
sentences.chinese: 更糟糕的是，这两辆车也要到井边去打水。

sentences.english: Percy: We better get some seltzer on that.
sentences.chinese: 我们去拿些苏打水清洗下吧。

sentences.english: Forget about throwing billions more of taxpayer money at Motown.
sentences.chinese: 别再打算拿几十亿纳税人血汗钱往汽车城打水漂了。

sentences.english: His dream of being hired as an editor proved to be pie in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他当编辑的梦想证明不过是竹篮打水一场空。

sentences.english: The machine used to sell soda water.
sentences.chinese: 这个机器以前是出售苏打水的。

sentences.english: I stood watching him play ducks and drakes.
sentences.chinese: 我站着看他打水漂游戏。

sentences.english: The water wars have become a ripe subject for jokes in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 打水仗在伊朗已经成了大家开玩笑的主题。

sentences.english: Try cutting your intake by replacing caffeinated sodas and coffee with non-caffeinated drinks.
sentences.chinese: 试着少饮用含咖啡因的苏打水和咖啡饮料。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice , strain over fresh ice and top with soda water.
sentences.chinese: 加冰摇合所有原料，滤入冰块，注入适量苏打水。

sentences.english: The mouse's job was to fetch the water from the well and carry it in.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠的工作是到井边打水并抬进屋内。

sentences.english: We also have great salad as well as soda and iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 我们还供应一流的沙拉，苏打水和冰茶。

sentences.english: The water wars have become a ripe subject for jokes in Iran. 'What kind of a country do we have?
sentences.chinese: 打水仗在伊朗已经成了大家开玩笑的主题。

sentences.english: The average American guzzles nearly a full gallon of soda every week.
sentences.chinese: 美国人平均每周要喝掉1加仑的苏打水。

sentences.english: Rinse your mouth with water and soda.

definition: to ladle water/to scoop up water
water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
to get food at a canteen
to wash the face and rinse the mouth
to rinse the mouth and wash the face
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
to wash one's hands/to go to the toilet
